title: Kumiko, the Treasure Hunter
actors: Rinko Kikuchi, Nobuyuki Katsube, Kanako Higashi, Ichi Kyokaku
plot: A jaded Japanese woman becomes convinced that a satchel of money buried and lost in a fictional film, Fargo, is in fact, real. With a crudely drawn treasure map and limited preparation, she escapes her structured life in Tokyo and embarks on a foolhardy quest across the tundra of Minnesota in search of her mythical fortune.
